name: ip-api
label: IP-API
description: IP-API helps to get the following information for any IP address: city, region (name & code), country (name & code), continent, postal code / zip code, latitude, longitude, time zone,  utc offset, european union (EU) membership, country calling code, country capital, country tld (top-level domain), currency (name & code), area & population of the country, languages spoken, asn, organization and hostname. This connector facilitates automated operation related to ip-api.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the IP-API to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: URL of the IP-API connector to access the connector website.
fields.name: server

operations.title: Get IP Geolocation
operations.description: Retrieves the geolocation of specified IPs. Execute batch API will query multiple IP addresses in one HTTP request.

parameters.title: IP Addresses
parameters.name: list_of_ip_addr
parameters.description: Specify the list of IP addresses whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved. eg: ['8.8.8.8', '24.48.0.1'].
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated IP addresses or list of IP addresses.

operations.title: Get DNS Geolocation
operations.description: Retrieve the Client Subnet (edns-client-subnet) and DNS Server. Execute DNS API will return the IP address and geolocation of the dns server the client used
